com.guoxiaoixng.gxadapter.sticky

类 StickyLayoutManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecyclerView.LayoutManager
      • com.guoxiaoixng.gxadapter.sticky.StickyLayoutManager

  • public class StickyLayoutManager
extends RecyclerView.LayoutManager
    A StickyLayoutManager that lays out mSection headers with optional stickiness and uses a map of sections to view layout managers to layout items.

    For more information, you can contact me by guoxiaoxing@souche.com

    从以下版本开始:
    16/9/19 下午5:14

    • 方法详细资料

      • addSlm

        public void addSlm(java.lang.String key,
                   SectionLayoutManager slm)
        Add a section layout manager to those that can be used to lay out items.
        参数:
        key - Key to match that to be set in StickyLayoutManager.LayoutParams.setSlm(String).
        slm - SectionLayoutManager to add.
